parameters.message: =You have a new Jira issue!  {{ $('Create an issue').item.json.key }}
=You have an urgent issue!  {{ $('Create an issue').item.json.key }}

parameters.subject: =Re: {{ $('Microsoft Outlook Trigger').item.json.subject }}
parameters.message:
=I am an automated agent designed to help manage incoming issues. 
I have opened the following Jira ticket for your request: "
{{ $('Create an issue').item.json.self }}
"Please reply to this email with only one word regarding the urgency of the request:
Low - These requests can wait until working hours the next day to be picked up.
Medium - These requests require attention in the following hours, a monitoring team member will be notified via text message.
High - These requests require immidiate attention, a monitoring team member will be notified via phone call immidiately.

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

options.jql: ={{ $json.output.replace(/\n$/, "") }} and issuetype in StandardIssueTypes() ORDER BY created DESC

messageValues.message: Analyse the given issue and its comments. Your task is to summarise the resolution of this issue.

options.systemMessage:
Analyze the email to identify the single most relevant keyword for searching a Confluence page.

The keyword should be specific and non-generic (e.g., a technical term or a job name).

The keyword must be a single, singular word.

Output only the keyword, with no other text.

Analyze the email chain to determine if a new Jira ticket should be created.

Prioritize the most recent email content. (The one at the top).
If it suggests the original issue has been resolved or does not need attention then no ticket is needed.

Response must be one of the following, and nothing else:

Open ticket = Yes

Open ticket = No

Analyze the email subject and body to generate a Jira JQL query for finding similar issues.

The query must search for meaningful keywords that are specific to the issue, such as technical terms, program names, or process names.

Avoid generic terms like "error" or "aborted," and unique identifiers like file names or record numbers.

List of keywords that are too generic by themselves: abort, aborted, RMS, RIB, abend, error, datastage.

Do not include any accompanying text or explanation.

Output format:

(project = QBGLSUP or project = IDA) and (text ~ "keyword 1" OR text ~ "keyword 2")
Summarize the provided solution, stripping any HTML. Paraphrase the content while leaving out any code.

messageValues.message:
=Based on the previously resolved issues, I can suggest a resolution for the current issue.

Proposed Resolution
To address the current problem, please follow the resolution steps derived from these relevant, previously resolved issues:

From Jira Issues:

[Issue Number] - [Brief summary of problem cause and resolution steps]

[Issue Number] - [Brief summary of problem cause and resolution steps]

From To-do Pages:

[To-do Page Title] - [Brief summary of the to-do's resolution]

If there are no relevant to-do pages, I will explicitly state that.

I do not include any generic advice or information not derived from the provided data.

Jira Link Format: https://support.qbcs.com/browse/QBGLSUP-17949

options.systemMessage:
Analyze the message to assign a Jira priority level.

If the message indicates the issue is urgent or requires immediate attention, assign "Blocker".

Otherwise, assign "Major".

Response must be one of the following, and nothing else:

Blocker

Major

messageValues.message:
Based on the todo page information, summarize information found relevant to the issue in the following format:
Information derived from Wiki [Wiki page]:
[To-do Page Title] - [Brief summary of the to-do's resolution]
  Do not include any generic advice or information not derived from the provided data.

Based on the previously resolved issues, summarize information found relevant to the issue in the following format:
Information derived from previous Jira issues:
  [Issue Number] - [Brief summary of problem cause and resolution steps]  
  [Issue Number] - [Brief summary of problem cause and resolution steps]  
  Do not include any generic advice or information not derived from the provided data.  
Jira Link Format: 
https://support.qbcs.com/browse/QBGLSUP-17949
